title: Was Moe Berg a World War II spy?
subtitle: Member of the Washington Senate, Maurice Moe Berg, never reached the Hall of Celebrity in Baseball, but he was proud to serve his country.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Maurice "Mo" Berg, graduate of Princeton Multilingual University, who played baseball at the 1920 and 1930 major league, lived a life of danger and machinations as an American military intelligence officer in Europe during the Second World War.
